name: Netrunner Revelation
description:
NETRUNNER Revelation

This is not the sequel to Netrunnerr 2 , This game happens between  Part 1 and 2

of Netrunnerr seires , This game totally happens in cyberspace where reality merges with virtual world of the game ,find glitches to make money to progress in the game

press Z,X,C for different point of view in the game , W,A,S,D for movement, Space to jump , M and N to mute music if player wants, ESC to quit the game
